steps.text: What are 2 or 3 things your child loves doing all the time, even when no one tells them to?
What are 2 or 3 careers your child has said they want to do one day?
Has your child started liking any new hobbies or activities recently?
Great! I'm generating a summary of your child's interests to share with teachers.
What are 2 or 3 feelings your child has when they think about being Black? (Good or hard feelings are okay.)
Can you name 2 or 3 traditions or cultural things your child connects with being Black?
Who are 2 or 3 Black people your child looks up to or feels inspired by?
Perfect! I'm creating a summary of your child's racial identity reflections for teachers.
What are 1-3 ways your child defines success?
What makes a space feel good for your child to focus or be creative in?
How can you tell when your child needs help?
What are some ways your child pushes through challenges in things they care about?
Excellent! I'm summarizing your child's can-do attitude and resilience for teachers.
How is your child's behavior or personality different at home compared to school?
What does your child usually do when they're somewhere new or unfamiliar?
Wonderful! I'm creating a summary about how your child navigates different cultures and environments.
What are 1-3 things you've taught your child to notice when deciding who to trust?
What are some ways a teacher or mentor can earn your child's trust?
Great insights! I'm summarizing how your child builds trust and what teachers should know.
What are some causes or community issues your child really cares about?
Amazing! I'm creating a final comprehensive summary that puts everything together for teachers and others.
